NoElementToModify: There is no element that you can modify
NoFilesUploaded: No files were selected for upload. Please choose a file to upload.

AgreeToTerms: By signing up, you agree to our
ProfileDeleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
ProfileDeleteInformation: This action is irreversible. Deleting your profile will result in the permanent loss of all your account data.
GameFinish: Congratulation! You managed to solve it!
MemoryCardDescription: Memory card games are a type of matching game that is often used as a cognitive and educational exercise. Players take turns flipping over two cards at a time, with the goal of finding pairs of matching cards. Find them all.
MemoryCardFinish: Congratulations! You've successfully solved it in this many steps
MemorySoundDescription: You will hear sounds one after the other and have to imitate them in the correct order.
MemoryNumberDescription: You will see a number and then rely on your memory to write it down
MemoryMatrixDescription: Remember where the marked parts were and click on them.
StatisticsCharts: The first chart shows the results of the daily tasks, the second shows the results of the memory card.
StatisticsTitle: Statistics on the course of development
StatisticsDescription: The results are presented in serial order according to the date of completion of the task.
StatisticsNumber: How many task results would you like to see?
StatisticsInfo: Only daily tasks are logged, except for the memory card game, because it is also logged in practice mode.
MemoryCardStatisticsDescription: The memory card is luck-based, so it has a separate set of statistics. It keeps track of the number of steps

HomeModule.Discover: Discover what your mind can do
HomeModule.Description: Exercise memory, flexibility, and more with the worldâ€™s most popular brain training program.
HomeModule.SpeedDescription: Challenge yourself with a variety of games that target your processing speed.
HomeModule.MemoryDescription: Play through a collection of games designed to put your recollection to the test.
HomeModule.LogicDescription: Flex your Planning, Spatial Reasoning, and Logical Reasoning skills with these games.
HomeModule.MathDescription: Conquer your way through a variety of Math challenges.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
